Package civitas.celestis.graphics.ray

Class GenericRay

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.ray.GenericRay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Ray
public class GenericRay extends Object implements Ray

GenericRay

A class implementing the Ray interface to represent a ray in three-dimensional space.
